name: Baldi's Basics Plus but with a twist
name_original: Baldi's Basics Plus but with a twist
description:
Baldi's Basics Plus, but with a twist! You're probably thinking there is no twist but let me explain myself before you throw a hissy fit in the comments.

The 'twist' includes:

  • Some changed voicelines from other Baldi's Basics games
  • Some changed textures from other Baldi's Basics games
  • Old item names
  • Some music reused from old Baldi games
  • A NEW ENDING
